Chapter 6 Alt 1.dialogue: you got excited after getting permission and rushed to the piano
before Beth could sit down.
Hey now, you don't know how to play the piano, let me experience it
How would I learn to play the piano if I don't attempt now.
Beth being considerate let [name] play the piano before herself. You started to press the keys one at a time and started to press multiple keys simultaneously.
Being inept with playing the piano you produce one of the most horrid sounds. Beth, being displeased with the unpleasant sound, kindly asked [name] to step away from the piano.
[name] I think that's enough of a practice for now, could you let me play the piano now?
Oh what's the big deal, I'm having fun, that's what matters.
But you're just pressing keys with no rhythm or harmony and it sounds horrendous.
Beth tried to gently help [name] get off from the piano but [name] started to throw a fit.
I don't want to.
You and Beth quarreled in front of the piano and accidentally broke some keys in the midst of it, Grandpa Laurence heard the incident and rushed into the scene.
Grandpa Laurence saw the piano her late granddaughter used to play, it's damaged now. Grandpa Laurence lost his temper and shouted
Get out, now!
It's [name]'s fa-
Before Beth could finish, Grandpa Laurence shouted again.
Get out now! Both of you!
You and Beth went out of Laurence's residence.
Why did you have to throw a tantrum there.
I just wanted to experience playing the piano for the first time.
I already let you play for a bit until I can't handle the horrid sound and you didn't have to throw a tantrum there, you damaged their piano, what are we going to do now?
I... I'm sorry, I didn't mean to.
